data.displayName: Origin Solar Boost Plus (Single Rate with Dedicated Circuit)

fees.description:
A $41.95 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move). This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.
You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/2402/Additional-charges

A $41.34 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.
A 0.24% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
$1.75 (incl GST) applies for each paper bill.
A 0.56% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.28% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.

electricityContract.terms: Not available all areas or for new properties being connected for the first time. For residential customers only. When the benefit period ends we'll still supply you with energy under our contract. We may extend your Energy Plan or set you up with a new one, but only if we've written to you first & you haven't told us not to.To find out more visit www.originenergy.com.au/2889/Terms-and-conditions
electricityContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including their amount, nature and structure) by notice to you at any time. The notice will be at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.

incentives.eligibility: The feed-in tariff component of this offer commences once the solar meter has been connected to the grid. During the benefit period youu2019ll receive a total feed-in tariff of 20 cents per kWh for every kWh of electricity exported to the grid.
The 20 cents per KWh is made up of our standard retailer feed-in tariff of 5.2 cents per KWh and an additional feed-in tariff of 14.8 cents per kWh.

The Terms and Conditions for Feed-in Tariffs u2013 Victoriau2019 applies to both the additional feed-in tariff and standard retailer tariff. When the benefit period ends youu2019ll receive our standard retailer feed-in tariff available at the time your
period ends as published on our website. Origin offers a standard retailer feed-in tariff of 5.2 cents per kWh exported which is subject to change at any time. All amounts are GST-inclusive (if any)

If you take up Origin Go Zero, we will offset 100% of the greenhouse gas emissions from your electricity or gas supply through Climate Active, a government-backed carbon neutral certification scheme. The cost is $1.50 per week.

eligibility.information: To be eligible for this offer you must purchase an eligible solar system from Origin. Your solar system must be net metered, the system is under 7kW & you must not be receiving a FIT under any Govt scheme. If you remove your solar system during the benefit period the offer will continue but you wonu2019t receive the FIT.

greenPowerCharges.description: For $0.65 per week 25% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 1.4 cents/kWh 50% of your electricity usage is matched with electricity from Government accredited GreenPower sources
For 2.8 cents/kWh 100% of your electricity usage will be matched with electricity from Government accredited wind GreenPower

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Ongoing contract which continues until you or we end it. The benefit period is 24 months.
